column4: I haven't looked to closely, but if you notice, doc/developer is already built in the ubuntu package, so you make want to pre-build it before uploading since it won't be able to fetch that file when building on launchpad
I figured that'd be one option
what I'd like to know is which commands the gutenprint dev team use to make the release tarballs from CVS
if I had a rel tarball it'd presumably have the docs prebuilt, thus making it far easier to package
